resources.string: You need the contact permission to pick a contact and automatically import its name and number. Do you want to enable it?
It is recommended that you enable the GPS so your coordinates are sent to your contacts.
You need the location permission to be able to send your coordinates to your contacts. Do you want to enable it?
Welcome to KeepMeSafe, the app that will keep you safe! This short tutorial will teach you all about how it works.

KeepMeSafe will send text messages to your friends and family when you don\'t feel safe. Just press the button! Your coordinates will automatically be added to the text messages so your contacts know exactly where you are.
First you will need to add the contacts who should receive the text messages.
Do this by opening the menu and click \'Manage Contacts\'. Then click the \'Add new contact\' button and import contacts or manually enter name and number. Then click \'Add contact\'.
Then you will have to enter the message that will be sent to your contacts.
After this you can just press the big red button to send the text messages to your contacts whenever you feel unsafe.
Your coordinates will be added automatically at the end of the message.
You can import contacts from your phone by pressing this button and picking a contact you\'d like to add.
List is empty, please add contacts...
